name: newFunctionSdkOperation

schema.fullComment:
--- dbStorageMethod: jsonSingle
---

Interface for arrow functions and normal functions
If you give a function a type explicitly on its declaration, this type will be set here.
The function is immediately exported upon creation. If the os dev tools are being used, this means it is also exported from the operation
all comments found in a function and the node that they belong to
parameters the function takes as its arguments, if any

maximum amount of times indedented in this function

good for determining the complexity and finding code that can be simplified/destructured into smaller pieces

finds all files that import this function

NB: this is not indexed because this information has nothing to do with the operation itself, but the exposure to the broader monorepo. This is calculated on the fly.
schema.nb: this is not indexed because this information has nothing to do with the operation itself, but the exposure to the broader monorepo. This is calculated on the fly.

schema.fullComment: Other keys in frontmatter that are group names, can be added here

for all exported functions in node operations, true by default false for others

can be overwritten using frontmatter
whether or not the function can be cached (relies on cache invalidation)

name of operation the model belongs to

- calculated value (not stored in database)
- can be `null` or an actual operationName that it was saved at
- can be `undefined` when you are creating an item, because then it can be set for you

path to dbfile

- calculated value (not stored in database)
- relatively from the project (without slash at start)
- can be `undefined` when you are creating an item, because then it can be set for you

path to db file

- relatively from the operation root folder (without slash at start)
- calculated value (not stored in database)
- can be `undefined` if the db file does not belong to an operation
- can be `undefined` when you are creating an item, because then it can be set for you

relative file path from the operation that this indexed instance is referencing to

e.g. src/general.ts

(no preceding slash)

description: Uses an array of functions to create an operation that imports all those functions and exports an object where all those functions have been comprised
